mapper.select: SELECT memNum, memName, memGender, memBirthday, memPhone, memEmail, memAddr, memCreated, memUpdated, memProfile, memNote FROM MEMBER ORDER BY memCreated DESC
SELECT memNum, memName, memGender, memBirthday, memPhone, memEmail, memAddr, memCreated, memUpdated, memProfile, memNote FROM MEMBER WHERE memNum = #{memNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET memName = #{memName}, memGender = #{memGender}, memBirthday = #{memBirthday}, memPhone = #{memPhone}, memEmail = #{memEmail}, memAddr = #{memAddr}, memProfile = #{memProfile}, memNote = #{memNote}, memUpdated = SYSDATE WHERE memNum = #{memNum}
UPDATE MEMBER SET memProfile = #{memProfile}, memUpdated = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE memNum = #{memNum}
